'''13w24a''' is the thirteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on June 13, 2013.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/06/minecraft-snapshot-13w24a/</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Command format ===
'''<code>doDaylightCycle</code>'''
* Added new gamerule for [[daylight cycle]].
** Stops time relative to day changing from incrementing, pausing the sky in place.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Spawn egg]]s'''
* Now work on water.

'''[[Unused textures#Skis|Skis]]'''
* Removed the skis texture, which was a [[Wikipedia:Red herring|red herring]] added by [[Dinnerbone]] in [[Java Edition 12w50a|12w50a]].

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Spider]]s'''
* Now have a chance to spawn with potion effects.

=== General ===
'''[[Resource pack]]s'''
* The game now uses resource packs instead of texture packs.
* The [[Texture Ender]] was released to convert 1.5-compatible texture packs into resource packs.
'''[[Game directory]]'''

* Renamed the ''game directory'' parameter for the game's main class (<code>net.minecraft.client.main.Main</code>): from <code>--workDir</code> to a more adequate <code>--gameDir</code>.
